title: Shelly Skandrani Articles | Similarweb
description: Looking for articles written by Shelly Skandrani? Check out all of Shelly Skandrani's insightful articles on the Similarweb blog, enter now!
content: HomeBlogShelly Skandrani Shelly Skandrani Shelly Skandrani is a Market Research content specialist for Similarweb. Her previous positions at Similarweb include video marketing content across all solutions, as well as written content for the Sales Solution and APAC & EMEA regions. Shelly has 15 years of experience as a content and creative writer and filmmaker. She studied screenwriting at UCLA, as well as theater at Beit Zvi, and uses these accumulated skills in her work as a content marketing manager today.
